reviewText: However this one is geared toward having Leslie's Total Strider machine. You can use it with a treadmill, but not my favorite DVD from Leslie.

Make sure that you read the product description carefully. I mistakenly thought that this was a usual Leslie walk (which I LOVE!) This is only for use with the Total Strider machine and isn't adaptable to indoor walking with a treadmill. You could probably use it while walking on a regular treadmill, but it uses a machine that is a treadmill w/moving arm.

Is probably a great product, but NOT useable unless you have the right machine to use with it.
